author: Katerina Malakhova
text: "Surprisingly delicious salads. Service is a bit rushed
column5: but that's expected"

author: Tay-Tay N
text: "The Food was disgusting. I ordered the steak salad and my boyfriend had the rosemary roasted chicken. When I tell you the worst meal we've had in years
column5: I recommend no one eat here. My steak was cold and looked raw. Way Too chewy and the greens looked days old. My boyfriend's chicken was pink and his string beans were soggy. He couldn't even eat the rice because the grains were stuck together and cold. One star
column6: hope I don't die of food poisoning."

author: Aries Zamora
text: 'Great and friendly staff
column5: delicious food!'

author: Benjamin Prosnitz
text: 'Tasty but overly oily'

author: Adrienne Doyle
text: 'So greasy and they need to learn portion control. Quality over quantity!'

author: Aakriti Mahajan
text: 'An affordable healthy lunch place. Their Mac and cheese is too good to not get with your other healthy food though.'

author: Mich Mick
text: 'I ordered the steak and it was still raw not even lightly grilled. And it came cold. And it was full of fat inside.\nThe quality used to be good but it has changed they should take quality out of there name. It’s not worth it.. it left such a bad taste in my mouth I had to throw it out
column5: and I lost my appetite.'

author: James Robinson
text: 'Always fresh and very affordable. Never a long wait.'

author: Mica Nkusi
text:
"*Delivery order review*

Tried this restaurant a number of times over the last 3-4 years and early on i was happy with the quality of the food. But in the last year that's changed dramatically.

My last order of the herb marinated steak is a prime example of how bad its become. The steak which used to be medium is more over cooked & dry
column5: the sweet potatoes which are supposed to be cubed and roasted came mushy and burnt ( not first time) and the sauted broccoli had an acrid taste.\n\nQuality level here has been consistently dropping over my last 3 orders so clearly not an isolated instance. Truly hope they improve but can't recommend at this point"

author: Sandra Herrera
text: 'Salad is not fresh chicken rice no sprouts again and macaroni and cheese is dry never again'

author: Hip Hop Junky Radio Show
text: '2 issues. Their pieces of salmon get smaller every visit and eating inside of there is damn near impossible with the flies trying to invade your meal. Other than that the food is pretty good. The mac n cheese used to be excellent but it seems as if they brought in a nee cook since last year. The mac n cheese now tastes gross'

author: Farhath Feroz
text: 'Ordered the Mediterranean salmon salad on UberEats. It came with a huge piece of metal in it'

author: Rick Klempner
text: 'First and last time. Ordered the steak salad from the Hoboken NJ restaurant. There were 3 pieces of steak and the rest of the salad was basically soggy scallion. Just awful. Do not recommend'

author: Nehal Samuel
text: 'Nice place where you can find different varieties of salad and food. I liked quinoa
column5: sweet potato and roasted chicken as well'

author: Tyesha Hill
text: 'Quality greens kitchen food is amazing! It will have you second guessing is it really healthy because of how tasty it is. Great place
column5: great atmosphere
column6: and great food.'

author: BT LUCAS
text: 'I ordered through Uber eats. Unfortunately 1 of 2 bowls I ordered were wrong. 2 sides of Mac and cheese is what I ordered. Instead I got one. I ordered extra steak. They give me three pieces. It’s laughable. Also
column5: because I ordered though Uber eats the restaurant simply can not do anything. I can find a better option in the future I’m sure. Too bad. They did had good.'

author: Carlos Zuniga
text: 'Excellent food and service I recommend'

author: Kaz V
text: 'Not worth 16 dollars for a salad.  Half of the bowl is mainly greens with minimal toppings. No attention to necessarily needs for a take out order.'

author: James Provence
text: 'Do not order from here for delivery. 2.5 hours after the anticipated delivery. Called the "restaurant" 2 times and they had no answers or were anywhere near compensating. Terrible service and the food that was eventually delivered was terrible.'

author: Addison Taylor
text: 'Always good stuff
column5: friendly staff'

author: George Augusto
text: 'Beautiful'

author: Brian G
text: "It's difficult for me to give 5 stars to fast casual restaurants. Though the staff is nice
column5: the interaction is merely transactional of a assembly line nature. The 4 stars is strictly food based
column6: which was hearty and delicious. Every year my father and I plant a garden with an assortment of vegetables. Both parents grew up in N.C. so farm to table was a way of life. I have a bias against a restaurant on the strip of Hoboken saying they are fresh/nutritious. However

author: Stacy Hoenigmann
text: "Best salad place in Hoboken! So many options and ways to customize your order
column5: and they always fill your bowl to the brim so you know you are getting the best portion size. Can get busy during lunch
column6: but that's to be expected."

author: Giselle Ross
text: "Ordered my salad at 1:20 for a 1:41 pickup. Walked over (15mins) to pick up my food only to get back to the office and realize its the wrong salad. I called to let them know and its been 30mins for them to deliver when I am only down the block (Im super pregnant and its 88 degrees outside which is why i'm not walking back) . The salad is not worth it - they provided me with a tiny side of dressing ON THE SIDE. Never ordering from here again."

author: Courtney Lind
text: 'My husband and I ordered salads from QG for the first time last summer and mine had a piece of thick wood toothpick in it!! Thankfully I didn’t swallow it but definitely concerned that it made its way in. We gave them another shot later on and not even kidding
column5: this time his bowl had the same type of wood toothpick piece in it!! I’m not sure why this keeps happening. Where are these coming from?? Definitely not ordering from here again but a warning to everyone else - check for foreign objects in your meal!!'

author: Rebecca Minacapelli
text: 'Please please please please please bring back the three bean ceviche.'

author: Rachel Britt
text: 'I LOVE this place! I have gotten it delivered 3 times in the past week. You get a decent amount of food for what you pay for and it taste really clean and high-quality. I did have a minor issue where they delivered someone else\'s meal but they sent a new one ASAP. Also
column5: the portion sizes seem to vary a bit. I\'ve gotten different amounts of chicken in the bowl each time. All in all though a good choice for healthy food. Plus their "simple kale caesar" is the best I\'ve ever had and I don\'t even like kale that much!'

author: Edward Cooper
text: 'They have very good quality food. I wish they would get Apple Pay.'

author: ObeseSkyDiver
text: "Food was good
column5: steak was cold and i got charged extra for avocado. I don't have an issuing paying extra for something but at no point was i told Avocado is extra when making the food and the menu doesn't say that it is extra. Just at the register after everything is packed and bagged that theres an extra charge for it. Please put down on the menu that Avocado is extra."

author: Scott Edwards
text: 'Yum
column5: yum
column6: yum. I just moved from NYC and am so happy this place exists...reminds me so much of my fave takeout
column7: Dig Inn. Love the Brussels sprouts

author: Richard England
text: "So I just ordered a Chef's Plate with a base of brown rice
column5: sides of carrots & broccoli
column6: with salmon as my protein.  When handed the bowl
column7: it looked as if somebody had eaten half of it.  This had to be the skimpiest $15 meal ever sold.  I get it if it were just the small piece of protein as I've had that happen before
column8: but this server went incredibly light on the rice & sides too....the RICE!!!\nI usually don't do this bc my opinion isn't overly important
column9: but I needed to vent. The silver lining is that it eliminated a choice of establishments in hoboken that I'll frequent."

author: Karen N
text: 'This mac and cheese!!! Also their Brussels sprouts
column5: beets
column6: sweet potato... basically everything.'

author: Mario Jorell Haigler
text: "Great salad fixin's you can make your own salad. It's basically the chipotle of salads lol"

author: Michael Small
text: 'Food good but no contactless payment in a food establishment in a pandemic? Come on...'

author: aasif jain
text: 'Very friendly staff and delicious food'

author: Natalie Nikolaieva
text: 'Super friendly
column5: clean and unbelievably yummy place!\nCome here If you’d like healthy and delicious food!\nI’ll come again for their salmon bowl with spicy  Brussels sprouts ❤️✨'

author: jon
text: 'Clean quality food.  Owner actually cares - *updated review just tried the steak its so good cuts like butter. Great clean food'

author: CJ
text: "Great experience and great food. My salad was fresh
column5: got a good bit for what I paid
column6: and on top of it staff was friendly and helpful. To top it off
column7: I forgot my wallet and they don't have apple pay yet (coming soon they stated) and they were extremely patient with letting me go to the mobile site to place an order. Jay was particularly nice and pleasant. Definitely will go back for a healthy meal."

author: Sly Inda
text: 'awesome staff...this is how you know a place cares
column5: it was almost close ..like a few mins before...and they ran out of Mac n Cheese but decided to make me a whole batch...awesome staff...really watch how the staff acts towards the end of a shift to know if they care'

author: Megan Nist
text: 'Used to order from here every week but they took it off uber eats and it says it’s “too far” and also won’t let me order from the website even though we live 15 min away (2 miles)'

author: Claudia C
text: 'Pleasantly surprised! Very tasty and healthy food & good portion size. The chicken and steak were flavorful and perfectly cooked. Would order from here again :)'

author: Muhamad Q
text: "You need to have an acquired taste to eat this food. I couldn't believe how the chicken and steak tasted like liver
column5: which was really nasty. Also the sides are so salty and bitter. The only thing i honestly liked is their salad and mac and cheese. Expensive salty food i couldnt dare to finish. First and last time ordering."

author: Breanne Crawford
text: 'Ordered salmon with sweet potatoes etc. Everything overall seemed ok but both me and my friend were sick the same evening after! Be careful!\nGiving two stars because staff was actually nice
column5: otherwise I would give one for food only.'

author: Kalanni More
text: 'If your ganna eat..\n\nEAT HERE‼️😋🥰'

author: Chao Wu
text: 'Great and fresh food'

author: Majid Ramezani
text: "Fantastic healthy food. Great warm and cold choices. I love hot dishes with two sides. I suggest trying their salmon. I visited this place during Covid. No dine in but I wasn't happy with the staff following Covid protocols. However they all wear masks
column5: they were touching the masks frequently when preparing the food. I like the freshness and quality of the food a lot but prefer not to visit during covid."

author: Anthony Pein
text: 'Amazing food'

author: Cassarah V
text: 'Don’t order online! Literally the 3rd time we have and gotten the SAME results. Not once were the sauces we ordered and paid for in the order or  extra chicken for my boyfriend that was paid for.'

author: Rachelle Martins
text: 'Ordered the tofu bowl via Grubhub and it arrived 30 mins late while I was in a meeting for 2 hours - not fun in a rumbling stomach. Food was ok - a bit too salty
column5: but healthy and fresh tasting.\nThe one major concern is that this restaurant completely ignore my double instructions to not send me any plastic utensils or straws. I hate that they out it in me to pollute the planet\nQuality greens team - pay attention to customer requests and leave the plastic stuff out!'

author: Anile geefe
text: 'Best server and food'

author: Thomas Steitz
text: 'Great food quickly
column5: but at a premium to most fast casual.'

author: lovetta G
text: 'The workers there are amazing and made me had a great experience while picking on my choices of food.'

author: Frances Rosario
text: 'This is the best food in Hoboken! Hands down! I definitely recommend the Rosemary Roasted Chicken! I can eat this any day 😌'

author: Rianna Ang
text: 'Their food is always great! When I go
column5: The taste it always the same! Delicious! All the ingredients taste clean and fresh!! Staff are always amazing!!'

author: David P
text: 'Great place.  Food is very fresh and healthful.  Restaurant quality food that can be picked up fast.  Salmon was delicious
column5: along with the beets side and the broccoli.  Will definitely return.'

author: K C
text: 'Just tried for the first time. Food was slamming!'

author: Beixi Li
text: "Ordered a delivery from their website and it's been two hours.\n\nfood is good though"

author: Precious Bonaparte
text: 'Love it'

author: LSUFAN67
text: 'First time in to grab a couple of salads for my wife and I.  We both ordered the Steakhouse Salads and a side of Mac and Cheese.  The food was great and well prepared.  The staff was busy but were able to keep up and keep the place clean and in order.  My only issue and why I rated a 3 was the music that was playing. I know I’m an older gentlemen but I can’t imagine why a restaurant that serves patrons of all ages
column5: races and ethnic groups would  allow vulgar music to play so loud you can’t hear the person standing next to you.  I mean this is a place to grab a bite to eat not a night club.  I hope they make different choices in the future and maybe this was a one off situation because the food is great.'

author: Jerry Martinez
text: 'Food and Ambiance is amazing. Staff is always Friendly'

author: Luis Muniz
text: 'Just ordered here for the first time! Herb marinated steak was incredible.  Best food I’ve had in a while!  Definitely ordering here again!'

author: Dr. Christine Palma
text: 'My go to healthy option in Hoboken'

author: Luke Mallet
text: 'Very good fresh food. Really like the curried carrots and the chefs plate. Can somwtimes make 2 meals'

author: Anthony Rodriguez
text: 'A bit too pricey but the food is heavenly and the staff attentive and synchronous it looked like a dance routine'

author: Steffanie
text: 'My absolutely FAVORITE healthy place in Hoboken. Is not only healthy but it’s delicious!\nMy only advise is to buy it in the main restaurant if you can because delivery is too expensive through seamless.'

author: Katie Luky
text: "Just received our first catering order from this place and I have to say that it's very similar to Dig Inn
column5: but doesn't have that funky smell that DIG inn food does
column6: thats a plus. Will probably order from them again. Def recommend them for office style catering."

author: Robert Mihok
text: 'Fresh
column5: quality food. Worth a try.'

author: rishi patel
text: 'Many "healthy" options
column5: but the food is a bit bland. I got the rosemary chicken plate and the chicken tastes a bit undercooked and a friend I was with got a salad
column6: in which the chicken tasted undercooked as well. Would give this a 3.5 stars because of this. Dig in vibes but not as good.'

author: Fatima Jones
text: 'The food was fresh and delicious .The place was clean and the staff was very friendly.'

author: Emily Ross
text: 'I will never order from this place again. They have the most rude drivers. I have a newborn. I asked the driver if he could come upstairs and quietly leave the food hanging next to my door. He said he is not allowed to do so I would have to come and grab the food from him or he will take it back to the store. I explained that I have a newborn baby and I do not want to expose him to the cold. How rude can you people be. Look outside the window to take his license plate its a honda licence plate c32 jsm. This driver needs to get fired immediately he does not have any idea how to treat customers'

author: Matt Origoni
text: 'Best quick salad spot in Hoboken. Huge hot portions too.'

author: William Baker
text: 'Grear simple salads and rice bowls. Wish the hot food was a bit healthier and simpler.'

author: Dave Curran
text: "I can't get enough quality greens. On the pricy side but the food is worth it for me. I'm a fan of the plate with quinoa
column5: steak
column6: half chicken
column8: and Mac and cheese. The sweet potatoes are good too"

author: Sherin Joy
text: 'The food here May be healthy but not tasty for me
column5: I am not satisfied. There was so less options for seasoning. It was my first try probably the last as well🙃'

author: Marie Papp
text: "They have really good chicken and salads.  The only thing I wish they wouldn't put so much oil and salt on their cooked kale and other cooked vegetables.  It maybe some vinegarette but it feels oliy and heavy. Their Alpine cold unsweetened tea is excellent!"

author: Jeremy Zuttah
text: 'Healthy and tasty choices. Portion size has definitely been shrinking since they opened'

author: Sym Cardnel
text: 'Just did not like what I ordered at all (salmon
column5: greens n rice)... wayyy to much oil n or butter. Nasty!!!'

author: John Ozed
text: 'Footlocker!'

author: Davis Timothy
text: 'Too much salt in carrot fries ugh!!!'

author: Celeste Smith
text: 'Your staff is so great & helpful!! Just want to say thank you to Cely for helping me out so so so much!!!!'

author: Carley Stamps
text: "Great lunch spot! You can make a salad or a chef's plate - like a Dig Inn and Sweetgreens combined!!"

author: Lhenee Riddick
text: 'Love the food'

author: Douglas Lindstedt
text: 'Fresh and Amazing just is the start!'

author: Sheniequa Davis
text: 'Great food needs more employees'

author: madeleine
text: "this place reaffirms the stereotype of healthy food being bland and boring. have y'all heard of marinade/salt??? also mad overpriced. I got tofu on mine
column5: and they gave me TWO slices. it was an extra $3. really? A BLOCK OF TODU IS TWO DOLLARS. 3 dollars for some warm tofu with some soggy parsley on it. smh.\nand the lady at the counter didnt smile at all
column6: and I had to stand near the counter for like 30 seconds before anyone asked if I wanted to order. big yikes. and there was no menu I could hold and look at while ordering
column7: so I kept having to step back while I was trying to order.\none extra star bc the ambiance was nice I guess
column8: but the music was bad and inordinately loud. like this is a salad bar not a club."

author: SA NA
text: "Their Carrot fries are always salty. The other day i actually got sick because of too much salt i ate from few fries...Everything else is fine but why so much SALT??? i just don't get it."

author: Travis W
text: 'Favorite salad in Hoboken'

author: Parth Soni
text: 'Like the name says
column5: the greens are fresh in quality!! I also had a side of mac and cheese
column6: which was like very good as compared to proper restaurants'

author: Richard Huber
text: 'Little pricey but super healthy and tasty.  Thank God this kind of thing has come to the area.'

author: Julie Goldstein
text: 'I just brought home my order and they got my order wrong. This isn’t the first time this has happened. I tried leave a message on the website but the prompt to “rate your order” didn’t work. I like the food but this is disappointing.'

author: X Mokoena
text: 'It was terrible service
column5: with the waitress/attending sales person seemingly uninterested and not listening. I had to repeat several times what I wanted in my salad and I asked for medium salad dressing but she completely drenched my salad ... I’m very disappointed and would not return.'

author: Christoph Marikovics
text: 'A little pricey for what it is
column5: but very tasty.'

author: Ana C
text: 'My second time here
column5: very impressed! Not only delicious salads but the chef’s plates are hearty
column6: healthy and plentiful. I had a chicken ( so tasty) dish with quinoa and roasted corn
column7: with the chipotle sauce.. so yummy!! I’ll definetely come back for more :)'

author: Robert Fenn
text: "It's a pretty cool place for those who like greens just not my cup of tea ..  Im a meat and potatoes guy"

author: LaRissa U
text: 'Salmon is worth waiting for. Salads are tasty'

author: Allan Lazenby
text: "I wasn't really stoked with what I got (tofu bowl
column5: brown rice
column6: sweet potatoes
column7: squash medly). The flavors were good
column8: but everything was either deflated and overcooked or really oily. I'll come back and try a salad since my co-workers seem to really love those."

author: Joe Mahoney
text: 'Quick
column5: tasty and healthy meal'

author: Erica Lee Mitti
text: 'Very fresh and amazingly good. HIGHLY recommended for a very good salad and filling.'

author: Alexandra Kottner
text: 'Consistent food and quick service. I love the healthy options and convenient location.'

author: Michael Bonner
text: 'very good!!'

author: Almir rrapo
text: 'Quick quality healthy food'

author: Dhruv Patel
text: 'Great food quality'

author: Gianni Ortega
text: 'Delicious and Healthy!'

author: laura leon
text: 'I love this place and the food. Its sooo good.'

author: Rashaan Trust
text: 'Great food'

author: Rives Flemming
text: '13 bucks for a sub par caesar salad. Place is a joke.'

author: Kenneth Morris
text: 'Food is so good will definitely be coming back.'

author: Sara Fisher
text: 'Tofu and brussel sprouts are always good
column5: but who’s idea was it to put celery in the kale? Take it out!'

author: Karen De Jesus
text: 'Delicious & fresh'

author: Mike Derzko
text: "Delicious
column5: plentiful and healthy! Another great offering in the quick serve restaurant space
column6: Quality Greens gives you a choice of brown rice or quinoa base and lets you add a variety of healthy toppings. If grains aren't your thing
column7: then go for a greens base and take it from there. Well seasoned
column8: well prepared food that keeps you healthy and happy. 5 stars."

author: Adriana Puga
text: 'Great vegetarian options'

author: Anand Iyer
text: 'Fast moving lines
column5: good food'

author: Elena Piper
text: 'Great fresh option
column5: build your own bowl (grains
column6: vegetables
column7: protein) or salad options.  Menu is very clear for dietary restrictions.  A little bit too expensive.'

author: Damel
text: 'Good food at a moderate price. Try the chicken or salmon entrees with the many tasty sides.'

author: Devesh Singh
text: 'Great food. Some days they can be a little off but they are very consistent. Definitely try the kale and the sweet potatoes.'

author: Chris Nicoletti
text: 'Great meal tasted home cooked !!'

author: Sayali Upasani
text: "I tried their grilled tofu chef's plate. They have really good healthy options. The sweet potato is amazing and also kale with caramelized onions."

author: Larry Murphy
text: 'Love this place I ordered a custom salad for lunch and had it delivered via Uber Eats. The salad was perfect!!!!'

author: Patricia Welcome
text: "Had dinner at a friends house who ordered individual dinners from here.  I had chicken with brown rice
column5: brussel sprouts and sweet potatoes.  Others had Salmon.  Every's dish was to their liking.  Seasoning was excellent.  Highly recommend this restaurant."

author: Evelyn Yupanqui
text: 'Good
column5: healthy  food'

author: Susan Adriansen
text: 'Great vegan options. Friendly staff.'

author: Sabitha Poladi
text: 'loved the grilled tofu with quinoa and carrot fries went twice in my 10 day visit to new York'

author: Elissa Hudiara
text: 'The steakhouse salad was delicious!'

author: Steven Hoffenson
text: 'Great place for a healthy lunch'

author: Team Delmonico
text: 'Food always fresh and tastes great'

author: Imyourkings King
text: 'So I go to this place about 4 to 5 times a week
column5: I work in jersey but live in nyc
column6: but sometimes even when I’m off I drive to Hoboken just to get the salmon from this place
column7: so early today I went and there were about 3 to 4 employees at the counter
column8: one of the employees even asked me if I’m there for the salmon again
column9: that’s how often I go there. I said yes and she turned around cleaning and doing whatever she was doing
column10: by soon as the white girl came
column11: ole girl jumped took her gloves off put new ones on and asked the girl if she needed help
column12: I was very mad and felt some type of way
column13: I brought it to Sheryl’s attention who wa stage manager on duty
column14: she apologized and offer me free cup of lemonade
column15: I always get extra meat with my food and it comes out to over 20 dollars
column16: as expensive as that meal is
column17: I’m expecting an outstanding customer service
column18: and not only that I always leave a 5 dollar tip. But never going again and I’ll tell my friends to stop going cause we do not tolerate racism and definitely only take our money where we are respected and welcomed.'

author: Behnoosh Golchinfar
text: 'Healthy delicious food but expensive!'

author: stephane Thiam
text: 'Excellent food and service'

author: T. Pisani
text: "Edit: they recently started weighing out their portions of meat which always results in getting less than you used to as you used to just get a full chicken breast but now they always take away some after they cut it up. Really not happy about that. the place is already expensive but at least I used to get a full piece of chicken\n\nI really like this place. Great option for healthy food that actually tastes good. A little pricey for my liking but the food is too good to let that stop me. One weird complaint though.. every single time i go there i have to swat flies away from my meal. I don't get why they always have them even in winter but it's annoying and gross."

author: Brett Hladczuk
text: "Are you sick of Chipotle? I have good news for you: there's another white girl heaven
column5: and it's right next door in Quality Greens. This is my favorite healthy place on Washington. The portions are big
column6: food is delicious

author: Heather Salas
text: 'Great food
column5: generous portions at a great price!'

author: Reese Huebsch
text: 'Great food. Always fast regardless of line size.'

author: William Shaw
text: 'I work there now so come check us out'

author: Alexandra Marszalek
text: 'Ok food for what it is
column5: but the NOISE is unbelievable. Loud music like it’s a club and employees just yell orders to each other. If i wanted this level of craziness I would have just gone to a sports bar.'

author: Richard Green
text: 'Gave away my order then gave the wrong order. Gave 3 stars because they usually are better.'

author: Cordell Zalenski
text: "So good I ate a here twice in one day! It's name and food match!!"

author: Jimmy Katayama
text: 'Sucks!!'

author: Maggie Nelson
text: 'Placed an order right when they opened at exactly 11am. Depsite this
column5: it took 1.5 hrs to arrive. Was trying to make a flight
column6: so I called a couple times and was promised that it was “almost to the house” which clearly was not the case. Food isn’t bad
column7: but customer service and efficiency is certainly lacking and will make or break a restaurant in Hoboken.'

author: Christian Herraiz
text: "Quality greens used to have amazing food but for the last 2 months have been subpar. I've gone there to get dinner three times in the last 2 months and each time the chicken is under cooked and pink. The Mac and cheese served was also reheated and hard this last time. I pick up dinner at 6/7 pm so the food shouldn't be old by then."

author: Clint Edwards (Darkheart)
text: "Good food I've always enjoyed my meal whenever I eat at this establishment."

author: William Peak
text: 'Awesome place! Love the tropical green tea and chopped salads!'

author: Kristen Ochs
text: 'Delicious! So glad to have a good tasting and nutritional option in town.'

author: adele baker
text: 'Great salads and entrys.  You can customize your meal. I had chicken
column5: my husband had salmon and our friend and steak.  The sides were delicious
column6: I had orange beet salad and kale with carmelized onions.  Everything was fresh and quick to put together. I would recommend for lunch or early dinner'

author: Robert M
text: 'Healthy food that is quite tasty'

author: Mahin Salimzade
text: 'Healthy food
column5: delicious 👍🏻'

author: Sean Thompson
text: 'Great quality food and friendly atmosphere'

author: Javier Salido
text: 'Our first time here and we’re really impressed! everything tastes so good 👌🏻and the team is amazing ⚡️'

author: Michael De
text: "Very good
column5: wholesome food for lunch. Setup is like a Chipotle.\n\nIt's a little pricey or I'd eat here everyday."

author: Andrew G
text: 'Almost certainly the best fast food in Hoboken. But you do pay for it. Nice service
column5: too.'

author: Edward Haas
text: 'Good food. Great for healthy take out. Clean but bare decor.'

author: Lexi Kottner
text: 'I get delivery from here regularly. The food is fresh
column5: simple and consistently delicious.'

author: Tom Koty
text: 'Great
column5: healthy food.'

author: Rob Parker
text: 'Like dig in but more accommodating'

author: salvatore brancato
text: "Quality of food is great. Salmon & Steak is incredible. Highly recommended. Might be a bit on the pricey side but you're paying for quality not necessarily quantity."

author: michelle Patel
text: 'Really delicious'

author: Marina Mariy
text: 'Very nice place for lunch. But I think they put too much oil during cooking.'

author: Alfredo Diaz
text: 'There were 15 people working there and not one asked to help us AND we were the only ones on line. Won’t be going back. Service sucks.'

author: Pearl Stars
text: 'Nice place to eat healthy salads and more. Spacious and bright to enjoy your weekend brunch. Staff is fun and thoughtful. Nice addition to Washington Street! Brussel sprouts
column5: broccoli and Mac&cheese were good. Kombucha with lemonade drink was delicious.'

author: Tiffany Jones
text: "Stopped here for the 1st time
column5: on my way home from work.  I got the herb chicken
column6: brown rice
column9: absolutely perfect...hands down the best! My new go to place for 'take out' :):)"

author: demonicmysteria
text: 'Very nice resturant
column5: great food'

author: evelyn garcia
text: 'Food is okay.\nFriendly staff.'

author: Veronica Glennon
text: 'Perfect option for a quick dinner with healthy options that taste amazing. Love the food!'

author: Carolyn Delia
text: 'Yummmm got the avo salad and it was delicious with the grilled tofu!'

author: Gilberto Lacayo
text:
'(Translated by Google) For people who like to eat healthy. I recommend this place.

(Original)
Para las personas que les guste comer sano. Les recomiendo este lugar.'

author: Nick Lenzi
text: 'Wow! I was so impressed with my delivery today. 1 it comes quickly 2 it was delicious. They make eating healthy taste good. The brussels sprouts and califlower were so good
column5: I feel like I could eat a popcorn bowl worth of them.'

author: Chaaz Quigley
text: "I rarely do reviews...this place is soooooo good! I had Rosemary chicken on brown rice with cauliflower and caesar salad. It was delicious! I'll definitely be going back."

author: quazie1214
text: 'Great place to eat healthy'

author: Gautam Matta
text: 'Dig inn like concept plus more options! Friendly staff!'

author: Ivan Friedrich
text: 'Variety of offerings
column5: great food.'

author: Besmir Alia
text: "Food is delicious
column5: freshly cooked
column6: you can choose between chef's plate or a custom salad. The environment is clean and spacious"

author: Marie Kelly
text: 'A lackluster clone of Dig Inn. More expensive and the food is just not as tasty.'

author: gabby velez
text: 'Love it! I got salmon with quinoa
column5: sweet potato and broccoli! DELICIOUS!'

author: D. T.
text: 'Great salads..fast service..clean'

author: James McCarthy
text: 'Was there today. Nice size portions food is very well cooked and the service is fast and very polite. Will bring my wife and kids next time. Thank you guys for even being polite after Thanksgiving.'
